thread.title: Ram Charan to dub for Salman Khan in Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
thread.title_full: Ram Charan to dub for Salman Khan in Prem Ratan Dhan Payo - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Ram Charan to dub for Salman Khan in Prem Ratan Dhan Payo
text: It is a known fact that both Salman Khan and Ram Charan share a very close bond. Continuing their relationship to another level, the mega hero will now dub for Salman in the Telugu version of his latest film Prem Ratan Dhan Payo. The Salman Khan starrer is being dubbed into Telugu and Ram Charan's voice is said to be an added attraction for the film. Sonam Kapoor stars as the female lead in this film which is directed by the legendary film maker Sooraj Barjatiya. Prem Ratan Dhan Payo is slated for a Diwali release all over.
